definition: a sandbank/a sand bar
granule/hoarse/raspy/sand/powder/CL:粒[li4]/abbr. for Tsar or Tsarist Russia
surname Sha
dam/dike/embankment/CL:條|条[tiao2]

sentences.english: The barrier-lagoons belong to marine regression type.
sentences.chinese: 本区的沙坝泻湖属于海退型。

sentences.english: The birds on the sand bank are continually crying.
sentences.chinese: 沙坝的鸟儿依然在嚎啼。

sentences.english: A borehole image of rock layers indicating an underground point bar.
sentences.chinese: 指示某地下曲流沙坝的一幅岩层钻孔图像。

sentences.english: Benzilan, who is Tibetan, which means beautiful Shaba.
sentences.chinese: 奔子栏是藏语音译，意为美丽的沙坝。

sentences.english: These sandstones are interpreted as having originally been point bar deposits .
sentences.chinese: 这些砂岩在成因上被解释为点沙坝沉积。

sentences.english: The village birds return home after playing on the sand bank.
sentences.chinese: 结束了沙坝的嬉戏，乡村的鸟儿已经回巢。

definition: dam/dike/embankment/CL:條|条[tiao2]
